title: PM Modi Hails India Becoming Fourth-Largest Economy, Says Youth Cheered Surpassing United Kingdom
description: PM Narendra Modi celebrated India's rise to the fourth-largest economy, recalling how proud the nation felt after overtaking the UK — its former coloniser. Speaking in Gandhinagar, Modi said India rose from 11th in 2014 to 4th in just a decade. He highlighted youth enthusiasm and said India’s $4 tri...

title: UK News: Breaking UK News, Politics, Economy News From United Kingdom
description:
Updated : Nov 23, 2025

Currently a Swiss tax resident, Mittal reportedly plans to spend most of his time in the UAE, where he already owns a mansion and is acquiring property on Naïa Island. He is ranked the eighth richest person in the UK with an estimated net worth of £15.4 billion.

title: India, United Kingdom likely to sign Free Trade Agreement by July end
description:
The process of legal scrubbing of the India-UK free trade agreement (FTA) text is progressing at a faster pace, and the pact is expected to be signed by the end of July, an official said on Tuesday.

To give an impetus to the process, Commerce Secretary Sunil Barthwal is in London with his official ...

title: Trump confirms trade deal with United Kingdom
description:
US President Trump and British PM Keir Starmer on Thursday announced a “breakthrough deal” on trade that leaves in place a 10% tariff on goods imported from the UK while Britain agreed to lower its tariffs to 1.8% from 5.1% and provide greater access to US goods.
